name: Club Intrawest - Sandestin

reviews.text: We've stayed here several times over the last few years, so it's worth a positive review, especially as we visit from the UK. Staff here are always helpful and polite and always make you feel comfortable and welcome. Although the decor hasn’t changed since our 1st visit (2007) it still doesn’t feel dated or old and suits the surrounding area perfectly.
reviews.title: Hidden Gem

reviews.text: The last time we visited was for a large family holiday. We shared 1 of the bigger rooms with the in-laws and our baby daughter. The rooms are so spacious that they accommodated 2 en-suite bed-rooms, 2 massive bathrooms and a large kitchen lounge / dinning area, so plenty of privacy when we wanted. The grounds are well maintained with various sized swimming pools, volley ball area and nature walks.
reviews.title: GREAT STAY!!
Superb Beach Resort
reviews.text: Outside of the resort and within a 10 minute walk we had options for various activities, sport (tennis), water activities, shopping, dining out, bars and the beach. Just to name a few. You can't really ask for more.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all, whilst alot of people from the UK will be heading towards the Orlando attractions, we'll be happily returning here.
reviews.title: Couldn't be better!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My family and I stayed at Club Intrawest - Sandestin over Thanksgiving week and as usual, we had a great stay. My wife and I have been living out of our timeshares for the last 18 months and CI - Sandestin consistently is the BEST of every place we have stayed! The staff is very friendly and helpful. The manager is great and meets with all the guests to check on their stay. MX is always on top of anything that may go wrong. CI-Sandestin provides the most/best amenities of anyplace we have stayed.
reviews.title: Beautiful resort

description: A Southern Golf & Beach ResortClub Intrawest is a private vacation club. From time to time, Guests are invited to stay at the Club on a nightly, cash basis. Located next to the calm waters of Choctawhatchee Bay, Club Intrawest – Sandestin features large balconies or comfortable sun rooms with deep Hemingway lounge chairs. Vacation Homes offer the comforts of home with full kitchens, flat-screen TVs and plenty of space to stretch out and relax. Spend an evening barbequing by the pool or enjoying a movie in the private movie theatre.Carved from 2,400 magnificent acres along the panhandle of Florida's Gulf Coast, Sandestin Golf & Beach Resort boasts the emerald-green waters and sugar-white sands of the world's most spectacular beaches. Explore the surrounding area, including Jolee Island Nature Park, world-class golf and tennis facilities, the lively Village of Baytowne Wharf and more.
